content: Which is the universally accepted best type of music?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or opinions, and I believe that the "best" type of music is subjective and varies from person to person. Different genres of music appeal to different individuals based on their cultural background, personal tastes, emotions, and experiences. What one person considers the best type of music may not be the same for another person. It's essential to respect and appreciate the diversity of musical preferences and genres worldwide.
